duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate, plan, document, perform, and track enterprise Information Technology (IT) project initiatives.
Facilitate planning, designing, and work management sessions with Client, divisions, and/or program areas.
Develop, track, and update project plans for enterprise IT initiatives.
Create design and implementation documentation according to project and work plans.
Conduct regularly scheduled status and update meetings with Client, divisions, and/or program areas.
Prepare, update, and track issues and risk logs for enterprise IT initiatives.
Track outcomes against objectives and report outcomes.
Ensure adequate resource allocations for the enterprise IT initiatives and report on resource issues and shortfalls.
